name: End of baah World
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg. In this seminar we design a small game with a new theme every week.

The theme for this week was: "End of the World"

Game Description:

Baaaah. The evil Sheepvillain has kidnaaaped Sheepdad daaaughter. Heee threeeatens to destroy theeeee woooorld!

Saaaave Sheepdaughter froooom the eeeevil SheepVillain aaaand saaave the woooorld. 

But caaaaaan you save heeeeer aaand the wooooorld?

Key Features:

  • Baaahhh
  • Intense chase
  • Shooting
  • Questioning life decisions (:

Credits:
